data.name: Name (optional, used as name prefix for all devices)

link.title: Link Accesspoint
link.description:
Press the blue button on the accesspoint and the submit button to register HomematicIP with Home Assistant.

![Location of button on bridge](/static/images/config_flows/config_homematicip_cloud.png)

error.register_failed: Failed to register, please try again.
error.timeout_button: Blue button press timeout, please try again.

abort.conection_aborted: Could not connect to HMIP server
